AAIM Employers' Association

Wordpress, Code, UX

View Project

This was a complex, custom WordPress build. I did the development on this project and helped out with a few UX elements, including the filtering on the homepage and how the service icons got used throughout the site when the service was mentioned.

We used Advanced Custom Fields to extend the templates as well as the custom post types we created for this site.
